item.description:
Tuesdays

7:30 – 10:30 PM: Manchuka 10 piece (5 horn) Funk and Classic Rock band Plus Beat the Clock draft specials starting at 7:00

 

 

 

Best Live Entertainment Venue

Milly’s giant stage, $30,000 sound system and in-house sound engineer are just a few of the things that make them the best venue in Manchester to play or see a live show.

There is always something happening in the lounge. Whether its $2 drafts and 1/2 price appetizers from 4-7 pm, or all night, you are bound to have a good time.

DINNER OR APPS: 6pm

BAND: 7p

THOSE OF YOU INTERESTED IN EATING OR DRINKING GET THERE EARLY WITH ME AND GRAB SOME SEATS.

I HAVE HEARD GREAT THINGS ABOUT THIS BAND AND YES ITS ON MY WORK NIGHT BUT HECK LIFE IS TO SHORT AND I WORK TO LIVE!!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Munchies and "MANCHUKA"
